body:
Say whatever the hell you want, I play the game, its in my state and I always wanted to go so I am going with a friend to have a great time. No its not cause I'm a pleb or nerd.. I just want to experience it. My friend and I went over the panels and decided which ones we wanted to go to so I thought I'd share. If you have any requests while I am there, feel free to comment and ask below! I am prepared to see a lot of cringe people, whiny people, cool people, but mainly just looking for a break from school and to have a fun weekend with a friend. Let me know if there are any other panels you recommend. I'm going to represent avicus :D(okay anyway I'm looking forward to learning about the livestreaming.)

Opening Ceremony

The Minecraft VR(Virtual Reality)

MINECON Costume Contest

Building your Community through Interactive live streaming

Saturday Night show.

Stories or streaming Minecraft LIVE

Youtubers vs 4JStudios Mini game showdown!


3D Printing & Minecraft: Making the virtual real

Rube Goldberg Machines, Roller Coasters & Mega Contraptions.

Closing Ceremony.
